title: Medical Device Labeling & Compliance Initiative
description: Spearheaded the New Product Development (NPD) labeling process across the full product lifecycle. This initiative focused on meticulously evaluating label and user interface risks, and ensuring all products met stringent regulatory and standards compliance for medical devices. Key activities included risk assessment, documentation, and cross-functional team leadership to guarantee patient safety and successful market introduction.

title: Advanced Sensor & Fixture Development
description: Led the design and development of a novel variable-reference sensor and multiple manufacturing fixtures using SolidWorks and rapid prototyping. This initiative resulted in a 40% increase in manufacturing throughput and significant production cost savings.

title: Critical Design Change & Value Recovery
description: Championed critical design changes by leading cross-functional teams of senior engineers. Successfully reduced manufacturing scrap by 25%, recovering an estimated $1 million in annualized product value.

title: Machining a Bolt-Action Pen from Aluminum
description: A precision machining project to create a functional bolt-action pen from solid aluminum stock, featuring a custom-designed mechanism and anodized finish.

title: Bolt-Action Aluminum Pen
description: A precision machining project to create a functional bolt-action pen from solid aluminum stock, featuring a custom-designed mechanism and anodized finish.

title: Chevron End-Grain Cutting Board
description: A woodworking project creating a durable and visually striking end-grain cutting board with a complex chevron pattern using contrasting wood species.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built from scratch to showcase my projects and professional experience across various disciplines.
